Package GUIElements

Class Form

java.lang.Object
GUIElements.GUIElement
GUIElements.Form
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class Form
extends GUIElement
implements ActionListener
Class that implements a Form. It is a GUIElement that contains other GUIElements. Unlike Containers, it can't contain another form.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Form​(GUIElement gui, int x, int y, java.lang.String action)
    Creates a form class

  • Method Summary

    void addFormListener​(FormListener listener)
    Add the given FormListener to the list of FormListeners

    Function that notifies the listener that the button is clicked

    returns the action of the form
    GUIElement getGUIAtPosition​(int x, int y)
    Returns the GUIElement at position (x,y) in the rootGUI.
    <T> java.util.ArrayList<T> getGuiClass​(java.lang.Class<T> cls, java.util.ArrayList<T> array)
    Returns an array with all the elements in this Form of the given class.
    java.util.ArrayList<FormListener> getListeners()
    Returns a list of all the listeners of given form

    returns the root of the form

  • Constructor Details

    • Form

      public Form​(GUIElement gui, int x, int y, java.lang.String action)
      Creates a form class
      Parameters:
      gui - the gui element of the form
      x - the x position
      y - the y position
      action - the action string of the form
      listener - the initialized listener, if no listener in the beginning is applied to it use null

    • getGUIAtPosition

      public GUIElement getGUIAtPosition​(int x, int y)
      Returns the GUIElement at position (x,y) in the rootGUI. If the rootGUI does not exist, return null.
      Overrides:
      getGUIAtPosition in class GUIElement
      Parameters:
      x - - x coordinate
      y - - y coordinate
      Returns:
